resources.string: DrillTutor uses your personal language notes to construct Flashcards or Lists which you use as drills to improve your language skills. Lesson summaries for any topic can refresh your understanding.
DrillTutor is topics-based. Organize your notes around any topics which are meaningful to your study program: Grammatical (adverbs, adjectives, plurals) or Subject (careers, work, food, travel).
DrillTutor source materials can be: Vocabulary, Sentences, Phrases, Opposites, Dialogs, Readings, Glossaries, and a Dictionary. Integrate them with audio recordings for playback during a drills.
